gmnotes.label: GM Notes
gmnotes.value: Rudi is a lean street kid. Just turned 13; a hard life in the rookeries of Ubersreik has left him haggard and cynical beyond his years. He has a talent for keeping a beady eye on people. Rudi has low-level connections to many of Ubersreik’s criminal players. Recently he has been working for Rolf Gucker, who has tasked him with providing any information about suspected Altdorf sympathisers to Lorbeer Weber.
